When I feel valued and respected, I am more motivated, productive, and committed to my work. In conclusion, having a respectful and honorable boss is vitally important to me, and I would rate this factor as 1, extremely important, in my ideal workplace.

Therefore, while accurate answers are important, they are not the only factor that determines a good manager. Other important qualities such as vision, leadership, and emotional intelligence are equally crucial in leading a high-performing team.
